column5: Thanks TJ from the Stelco Fishing Club for your kind donation and letting me post about our night on OFC. Our night went off great. We had 300 people that attended. Pete Boman did a great fishing seminar along with comedian Mark Crocker and his puppet Chester. As mentioned Pete Bowman is a great guy to talk to and also is Mark Crocker. Thanks TJ Dave (Fish Farmer)
Yes a great big THANK YOU TJ, your generousity is greatly appreciated.
